public class ReportsScreenController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
This class provides logic for the reports screen

    onEnterB(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)

    • initialize

      public void initialize(URL url, ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
      This initializes the tableview and all the combo boxes
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
      Parameters:
      url - root path for the view reports list form
      resourceBundle - resources used to localize the reports form

    • onEnterB

      public void onEnterB(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws SQLException
      This method searches the appointments table in the database for matching appointments based on the data gathered from the combo boxes, and provides an error if incomplete information was gathered
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - the enter button clicked
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • onContactsCbox

      public void onContactsCbox(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      This method uses a lambda to filter and sort through matching appointments by the chosen contact information
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - a filtered list

    • onCustomerDelB

      public void onCustomerDelB(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      This method sets text telling the user how many customers have been deleted so far. This is for the third report
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - Show Me! button clicked
